mapper.select: select product_id, product_no, product_name, product_type, product_describe, product_brand, in_price, out_price, product_stock, lowest_stock, is_stockout, is_new, is_sale, sale_time, product_url from product where product_id=#{productId};

select product_id, product_no, product_name, product_type, product_describe, product_brand, in_price, out_price, product_stock, lowest_stock, is_stockout, is_new, is_sale, sale_time, product_url from product where product_no = #{productNo};
select product_id from product where product_no = #{productNo}
select count(product_no) from product where product_no = #{key};

select count(product_type) from product where product_type = #{productType};
select count(product_brand) from product where product_brand = #{productBrand};
SELECT COUNT(*) AS productCount,COUNT(IF(is_stockout,1,NULL)) AS stockOutCount,COUNT(IF(is_sale,1,NULL)) AS saleCount,COUNT(IF(!is_sale,1,NULL)) AS noSaleCount FROM product;
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_no, product_name, product_type, product_describe, product_brand, in_price, out_price, product_stock, lowest_stock, is_stockout, is_new, is_sale, sale_time, product_url) values (#{productId},#{productNo},#{productName},#{productType}, #{productDescribe},#{productBrand},#{inPrice},#{outPrice}, #{productStock},#{lowestStock},#{isStockOut},#{isNew},#{isSale}, #{saleTime},#{productUrl});
